analysis.description:
Arm (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#81-88) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#81-82)

newCrowdsale.forwardFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- owners[i].transfer(amountToBeSent) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#186-190)

newCrowdsale.forwardFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(owners[i],partnerTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#193-194)

newCrowdsale.majorOwnerShares should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#101-102)
newCrowdsale.minorOwnerShares should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#102-103)
newCrowdsale.share should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#105-106)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_walletMajorOwner' of newCrowdsale.newCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#131) is not in mixedCase
newCrowdsale.share (/unique_chucks/34/0xf192d4a83ffe1f78c469eb4b89ca8557d313bf1a.sol#105-106) is never used in newCrowdsale
